mapper.select: select a.cust_no , date_format(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as create_date ,a.cust_name ,a.chart_no ,a.cust_id ,a.visit_cd ,a.visit_dtl_cd ,a.visit_cn ,(select phone_area_no from tb_cust_phone where primary_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = a.cust_no) as phone_area_no ,(select phone_no from tb_cust_phone where primary_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = a.cust_no) as phone_no ,(select zip_no from tb_cust_addr where primary_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = a.cust_no) as zip_no ,(select main_address from tb_cust_addr where primary_yn = 'Y' and cust_no = a.cust_no) as main_address from tb_cust a where a.del_yn = 'N' order by a.update_date desc
select a.cust_no ,a.create_date ,a.cust_name ,a.resident_no ,a.chart_no ,a.cust_id ,a.visit_cd ,a.visit_dtl_cd ,a.visit_cn ,a.rec_per ,a.remark_cn from tb_cust a where a.cust_no = #{cust_no}
mapper.update: update tb_cust set del_yn = 'N' where cust_no = #{cust_no}
